code: export var getFilmSatisfaction=function getFilmSatisfaction(filmRating){var filmSatisfaction;if(filmRating<3){filmSatisfaction='Bad';}else if(filmRating<5){filmSatisfaction='Normal';}else if(filmRating<8){filmSatisfaction='Good';}else if(filmRating<10){filmSatisfaction='Very good';}else if(filmRating===10){filmSatisfaction='Awesome';}else{filmSatisfaction='N/A';}return filmSatisfaction;};
